      • createHyperlinkListener

        protected javax.swing.event.HyperlinkListener createHyperlinkListener()
        This listener will be used in 'copyable' mode when a link is updated (clicked, entered, etc.).

      • setCopyable

        public JBLabel setCopyable(boolean copyable)
        In 'copyable' mode JBLabel has the same appearance but user can select text with mouse and copy it to clipboard with standard shortcut. By default JBLabel is NOT copyable Also 'copyable' label supports web hyperlinks (e.g. opens browser on click)
        Returns:
        'this' (the same instance)

      • setAllowAutoWrapping

        public JBLabel setAllowAutoWrapping(boolean allowAutoWrapping)
        In 'copyable' mode auto-wrapping is disabled by default. (In this case you have to markup your HTML with P or BR tags explicitly)
